Title: Authorizes court to order temporary employee increase during pendency of court ordered injunctive relief in favor of the employer
Summary: Authorizes court to order temporary employee increase during pendency of court ordered injunctive relief in favor of the employer.
LawCode: Amd ยง213, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to ordering a temporary cost of living increase to employees after a court grants an injunction in response to a strike
